page.title: 07LIFE STYLES..
page.content: Bill McSeveny came to live on Pitbladdo farm, in one of the tied cottages, about 6 months ago. He is principal teacher of guidance and also an art teacher at Bell Baxter High School. He chose to live in the country rather than in Cupar because he has always liked to be a little isolated. Also many of his hobbies involve being out of doors; for example he enjoys shooting, fishing, walking, running, visiting the local area and playing football. At present Mr.McSeveny travels to work by car but he will soon have to find another method of transport e.g. the school bus. Public transport is very infrequent and in Winter access is always a problem. Mr.McSeveny worked on the farm while planting was in progress.
